headers.subject: [tosdr:2385] Wikipedia can block your account

html:
In certain (hopefully unlikely) circumstances it may be necessary for either ourselves or the Wikimedia community or its members (as described in Section 10) to terminate part or all of our services, terminate these Terms of Use, block your account or access, or ban you as a user.

http://wikimediafoundation.org/wiki/Terms_of_Use#12._Termination 

--
tosdr.org | twitter.com/tosdr | github.com/tosdr
---

subject: Wikipedia can block your account
text:
>
> In certain (hopefully unlikely) circumstances it may be necessary for 
> either ourselves or the Wikimedia community or its members (as described in 
> Section 10) to terminate part or all of our services, terminate these Terms 
> of Use, *block your account or access, or ban you as a user*.


http://wikimediafoundation.org/wiki/Terms_of_Use#12._Termination 

-- 
tosdr.org | twitter.com/tosdr | github.com/tosdr
